column1: Webinar: Pathways to Careers at NASA - Subject Matter Experts (Involved in Lunar Science & Exploration
column3: Astromaterials Research & Exploration Science (ARES) @ NASA JSC
column20: Curious about pathways to careers at NASA? Register for this event to connect with subject matter experts Sara Schmidt, Juliane Gross, & Trevor Graff to learn about their career pathways to NASA.
column21: Curious about pathways to STEM careers at NASA? Join the NASA Astromaterials Research and Exploration Science (ARES) team for a webinar featuring subject matter experts (SMEs) Sara Schmidt, Juliane Gross, and Trevor Graff. Learn about their backgrounds, hobbies and interests, educational and professional journeys, and more! SME presentations will be followed by an optional ~20 minute Q&A session. This event is designed for educator-led student groups, college students and professors, and formal/informal educators.
column30: Education, General Science, Geology and Earth Science
column32: STEM Careers, Career pathways, NASA Science, students, college students, next generation scientists
